subject: Volvo Ocean Race
Sailboats and Sailing
lead_paragraph: The French team Groupama earned its first stage victory in the Volvo Ocean Race, defeating the overall leader, Telefonica of Spain, in a sprint to Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates.
snippet: The French team Groupama earned its first stage victory in the Volvo Ocean Race, defeating the overall leader, Telefonica of Spain, in a sprint to Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates.
